I'm sorry to hear that hiking may not be possible for you in Bled, but there are still several other outdoor activities you can enjoy! Here are some additional ideas:

1. Sightseeing tours: There are several sightseeing tours, such as bus tours or boat rides, showcasing the natural highlights and landmarks of Bled.

2. Fishing: If you enjoy fishing, you can hire a guide to take you to the best fishing spots in the area.

3. Golfing: If you like golfing, Bled offers one championship golf course and a driving range.

4. Swimming and water sports: Lake Bled is perfect for swimming, and you can also try water sports like stand-up paddleboarding, windsurfing, and kiteboarding.

5. Horseback riding: Horseback riding is available in the nearby town of Lesce, and you can enjoy a beautiful countryside ride.

6. Zip lines: Enjoy the thrill of flying with zip line activities that offer great views of surrounding mountains and valleys.

These are just a few suggestions, and there may be other outdoor activities available in the area depending on your interests and mobility constraints. Always check with tour operators and activity providers to ensure their activities are wheelchair accessible and can accommodate your specific needs.
